nodes.text: The Dur-24 wrist laser was a mounted laser weapon manufactured by BlasTech Industries that combined the full firepower of a standard blaster rifle with a range of up to 50 meters. Boba Fett incorporated one into his left wrist gauntlet. During a skirmish at the Great Pit of Carkoon, Fett attempted to shoot Luke Skywalker with his wrist blaster after the Jedi destroyed his EE-3 carbine rifle, but was knocked into the sarlacc after firing a few blasts that missed the target.
